tasks.task: Participate in a food safety education session on farms in Maryland
subtasks: Learn about differences between GAP certification and produce safety rule compliance
Understand voluntary versus mandatory food safety programs
Identify crop-specific inspection requirements for the produce safety rule
Review market access options and buyer requirements for GAP certification
Navigate exemptions from the produce safety rule based on farm sales and product criteria
Understand the process for obtaining and maintaining a GAP certification
Address the challenges of wildlife management on agricultural lands
Implement cleaning and sanitizing protocols for farm equipment and tools
Develop a water quality management plan, including testing and source protection
Create a worker training program aligned with produce safety guidelines
Prepare for regulatory inspections and understand the inspection process
Explore resources for farm safety audits and compliance assistance
